data.persona: I am worried about the wolves that keep attacking the livestock. They're getting bolder, though. The headmen have decided to send out a hunting party to thin out the wolves. They leave today. The bravest men will get a reward.
data.description:
You are in the Woods.
The woods are vast. Everywhere you turn it all looks the same. There are scratches on the trees from lost travelers marking their path. There are sounds coming from everywhere and yet no where. There are faint yellow circles up in the trees and bushes, possibly eyes starting at you.
The wolves is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The forest was never all that well known because people swore it disappeared from time to time. No one was ever sure if it was ever a thing that really existed until you were inside of it. And by then you had traveled so far in that only a rare few found their way out. data.short_motivation: I would need a weapon to slay the wolves
data.mid_motivation: I would need a base of operations as I hunt for wolves
data.long_motivation: I would need to map out the area to know where the wolves are and eventually drive them away.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go safe clearing that can be easily defended and that provides bird's eye view of forest
